summary: Two men, six meals in six different places on a road trip around Italy. Liguria, Tuscany, Rome, Amalfi and ending in Capri.
cast: Steve Coogan|Rob Brydon|Rosie Fellner|Claire Keelan|Marta Barrio|Tim Leach|Ronni Ancona|Rebecca Johnson|Alba Foncuberta Bufill|Flora Villani|Alessandro Cuomo
title: Viaje a Italia
